subtopics.title: Vegetarian and Non-Vegetarian Food
subtopics.content:
## Types of Food

People who eat only vegetables, fruits, and milk products but no eggs, fish, or meat are vegetarians. People who eat eggs, fish, and meat are non-vegetarians. Milk is important for strong bones and teeth; drink it daily along with curd and buttermilk.
